snippet.title: Webjet closes in on acquisition, prepares raising
snippet.content:
Fund managers are bracing for an equity raising at Webjet, with the company expected to announce an offer to help fund its latest acquisition. Sources said Webjet was seeking to buy Jac Travel, a business to business travel agent based in the UK. A deal is expected as early as Wednesday. The acquisition is expected to be worth about $200 million.
Webjet shares went into a trading halt on Wednesday morning. More to come
